profile.name: Kendall Roy
profile.currentTitle: Former COO & Head of M&A, Waystar Royco
profile.headline: Led $192B merger negotiations and managed $50B+ acquisition pipeline for global media conglomerate. Harvard MBA with deep expertise in capital markets, strategic M&A, and digital transformation.
profile.executiveSummary: Second-generation media executive who served as COO and head of acquisitions at Waystar Royco, a $95B global media and entertainment company. Led the company's digital transformation strategy, negotiated the landmark GoJo merger, and managed Waystar's $50B+ acquisition pipeline. Combines Ivy League finance training with hands-on operational experience across broadcast, digital, and entertainment divisions.

evidence.outcome: Led negotiation of $192B GoJo-Waystar merger — largest media deal in history
evidence.description: Directed due diligence, term negotiation, and regulatory strategy for transformative cross-border transaction

evidence.outcome: Managed $50B+ acquisition pipeline evaluating 20+ targets annually
evidence.description: Built and directed M&A team analyzing potential acquisitions across media, technology, and entertainment sectors

evidence.outcome: Structured $5B debt offering to fund acquisition strategy at favorable terms
evidence.description: Worked with investment banks to design and execute capital markets transactions supporting M&A program

evidence.outcome: Managed investor roadshows presenting company strategy to top 50 institutional shareholders
evidence.description: Delivered compelling strategic narrative to institutional investors during periods of market uncertainty

evidence.outcome: Developed Waystar digital strategy projecting $3B streaming revenue within 5 years
evidence.description: Created comprehensive digital transformation roadmap addressing cord-cutting disruption and platform competition

evidence.outcome: Launched Vaulter acquisition to accelerate digital media capabilities
evidence.description: Identified and acquired digital media company to build Waystar's online content and distribution capabilities

evidence.outcome: Built valuation models for $192B GoJo transaction accepted by board and advisors
evidence.description: Developed complex DCF, comparable company, and synergy models supporting merger negotiations

evidence.outcome: Authored 5-year strategic plan repositioning Waystar from legacy media to digital-first platform
evidence.description: Developed comprehensive strategy addressing streaming disruption, cord-cutting, and platform competition

evidence.outcome: Managed investor communications during crisis maintaining institutional investor confidence
evidence.description: Conducted personal outreach to top 20 shareholders during cruises scandal and succession uncertainty

evidence.outcome: Navigated board dynamics during contested CEO succession involving family and independent directors
evidence.description: Managed complex stakeholder relationships across family shareholders, institutional investors, and independent board members

evidence.outcome: Delivered keynote speeches at media industry conferences reaching 5,000+ attendees
evidence.description: Presented Waystar's digital vision at industry events including Allen & Company Sun Valley Conference

evidence.outcome: Conducted live press conference announcing management changes during corporate crisis
evidence.description: Managed high-pressure public communication with global media scrutiny and real-time market reaction

evidence.outcome: Directed due diligence teams of 30+ analysts and advisors across major transactions
evidence.description: Coordinated financial, legal, operational, and technology diligence streams for complex acquisitions

evidence.outcome: Developed competitive intelligence framework tracking 8 major media competitors
evidence.description: Built systematic analysis of Disney, Comcast, Netflix, and tech platform competitive positioning

evidence.outcome: Assembled and led M&A team of 15 professionals across strategy, finance, and legal
evidence.description: Recruited and developed high-performing team capable of managing multiple concurrent transactions

evidence.outcome: Identified streaming market opportunity 3 years before Waystar formally entered the space
evidence.description: Analyzed cord-cutting trends, consumer behavior shifts, and competitive landscape to advocate for streaming investment

evidence.outcome: Developed FCC and antitrust compliance strategy for GoJo merger approval
evidence.description: Worked with legal teams to structure transaction minimizing regulatory review timeline and risk

evidence.outcome: Negotiated Vaulter acquisition at 15% below initial asking price
evidence.description: Applied competitive pressure and alternative analysis to achieve favorable purchase terms

evidence.outcome: Managed external communications during cruises scandal reducing share price impact
evidence.description: Coordinated messaging across PR, investor relations, and media to contain reputational damage

evidence.outcome: Evaluated content acquisition and original programming investment for streaming launch
evidence.description: Analyzed content economics including licensing costs, original production ROI, and viewer acquisition metrics

evidence.outcome: Oversaw development of Waystar streaming platform MVP
evidence.description: Managed product development process from concept through beta launch

evidence.outcome: Identified GoJo as transformative acquisition target 18 months before formal discussions began
evidence.description: Recognized strategic fit between Waystar content assets and GoJo technology platform before market consensus

evidence.outcome: Identified $4B valuation discrepancy in acquisition target financial projections
evidence.description: Applied detailed analytical review to challenge assumptions in advisor-prepared models

evidence.outcome: Continued executive performance through multiple personal and professional crises
evidence.description: Maintained strategic focus and operational delivery despite family conflict, personal struggles, and public scrutiny

evidence.outcome: Pursued CEO succession across multiple attempts demonstrating sustained strategic ambition
evidence.description: Maintained long-term vision for company leadership despite setbacks and competitive family dynamics

evidence.outcome: Delivered compelling board presentations that shifted director votes on key strategic decisions
evidence.description: Combined data-driven analysis with narrative storytelling to influence governance outcomes

evidence.outcome: Delivered spontaneous rap performance at company event
evidence.description: Demonstrated cultural awareness and willingness to engage authentically with contemporary culture

workHistory.title: COO & Head of Acquisitions
workHistory.description: Led M&A function managing $50B+ acquisition pipeline. Negotiated $192B GoJo merger. Directed digital transformation strategy. Managed investor relations during crisis periods.

workHistory.title: VP, Corporate Development
workHistory.description: Evaluated and executed mid-market acquisitions in media and technology. Built M&A team and process framework.

workHistory.title: Associate
workHistory.description: Advised media companies on M&A and capital markets transactions. Built financial models and supported deal execution.

purpose: I see the future this company needs. I will drag it there — even if I have to drag my family with it.
